name: Mysterious Door
description:
You've passed through the Mysterious Door and now find yourself in a kaleidoscope dream
Gravity seems to have increased, it's hard to stand

actor.name: Lyssa, Daughter of Nyx
actor.actorRoomText: Towards the center of the room sits a pale faced women, adorned in a tattered dress, playing a lune
actor.secretText: Thank you for saving me from my madness, this place has grown heavy on my soul
dialogs: Please, keep away, I don't want to hurt you
Lyssa goes into a mad rage and the room is seemingly warping
... farewell... Lyssa seemingly melts into the floor

item.name: Lyssas flute
item.inscription: It seems life could not grant us with the love we deserved, now we look to the gods in the sky... I

trivia.question: How many planets are named after Gods from mythology?
Many birds have a gland that produces a waxy oil to waterproof feathers called a _____ gland?
How long after hatching are Ducklings able to walk and leave the nest?
a group of ducks can be called a ______?
How many eyelids does a duck have?

name: long stairwell
description:
You entered a stairwell which seemed to have no end...
Finally it comes to an end, you can no longer see the light from the doorway from which you came but only an old steel door that seems to have been barred shut.
You should probably turn back

actor.name: Mak
actor.actorRoomText: You turn around to leave and but you feel a pull at your arm
actor.secretText: As the paths ahead are certain to be dark, I shall certainly be with you...
dialogs: I've always practiced this; Love yourself, move your body. Watch your portions...
Midway upon the journey of life we have found ourselves in this forest dark, your path ends here...
Mak releases you arm, you should probably leave...

trivia.question: An adult male duck is referred to as a _____?
Many birds have a gland that produces a waxy oil to waterproof feathers called a _____ gland?
How long after hatching are Ducklings able to walk and leave the nest?
a group of ducks can be called a ______?
How many eyelids does a duck have?
